main event: On 21st September 1954 in Venice, California, a civilian reported a stationary circular-round fireball UFO that disappeared over the horizon after 15 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The UFO appeared to be a circular-round fireball with a yellowish-orange to red color.
It was observed using binoculars and the naked eye for 15 minutes before disappearing over the ocean horizon.
The object repeatedly moved westward, became stationary again, and then disappeared over the horizon.
Witnesses reported clear visibility of six miles with haze, and the flight service was notified about the sighting.
The report also mentions previous similar UFO sightings in the area.
